title: Angular Hello World
description: This site is built with angular, angular material & angular material flex layout. Learn how to build a site with angular 2

title: AngularJS Hello World
description: Learn how to build a site similar to this using AngularJS (angular version 1.x)

title: NativeScript Hello World
description: Learn how to build a native android app using telerik's nativescript

title: Ionic Hello World
description: Learn how to build a hybrid android app using the ionic framework
